response.content:
The weather in Tokyo during the last week of March typically features mild temperatures, with average highs around 15-20Â°C (59-68Â°F) and lows around 7-10Â°C (45-50Â°F). There may be some rain, so it's advisable to pack:

- Light layers (t-shirts, long sleeves)
- A light jacket or sweater
- An umbrella or raincoat
- Comfortable shoes for walking

This should keep you comfortable for the festival activities!
